lead_paragraph: When Time Warner Cable agreed to be bought by Comcast, the cable company was in a weakened state. No more. Now it could pursue another deal or become a suitor itself.

headline.print_headline: Healthier Time Warner Cable Emerges From Quashed Deal With Far More Options
headline.main: Healthier Time Warner Cable Emerges From Quashed Deal With Far More Options

snippet: When Time Warner Cable agreed to be bought by Comcast, the cable company was in a weakened state. No more. Now it could pursue another deal or become a suitor itself.
abstract: Time Warner Cable has steadily improved its business since disastrous failure of proposed $45 billion sale to Comcast and battle with CBS that produced lengthy blackout of network to TWC customers; analysts agree that company has met its recent challenges, and forecast its continued strength and growth.
